data.oai_dc:dc:
De Unie van Bosgroepen is de overkoepelende organisatie van de Bosgroepen. De Unie bundelt subsidie-aanvragen en is spreekbuis naar de rijksoverheid. De Unie coördineert tevens projecten die de Bosgroepen gezamenlijk uitvoeren, zoals automatisering, richtlijnen voor beheerplanning, kwaliteitsverbetering en certificering.322/5000The Union of Forest Groups is the umbrella organization of the Forest Groups. The Union bundles grant applications and is the mouthpiece to the national government. The Union also coordinates projects that the Forest Groups carry out together, such as automation, guidelines for management planning, quality improvement and certification.

More than 1200 members are affiliated with the Forest Groups. These are private individuals, foundations, estates, abbeys, care institutions, nature conservation organizations, water supply companies and governments, such as water boards and municipalities. Together these members have more than 400,000 hectares of forest and nature.

Positive observations without protocol

Resolution of dataset available in 5 x 5 km. Higher resolution available via https://www.ndff.nl / serviceteamndff@natuurloket.nl

Bosgroep Midden Nederland: 1,979 records (April 2018)Bosgroep Noordoost Nederland: 28 records (April 2018)Bosgroep Zuid Nederland: 0 records (April 2018)
